about.title: About Me
about.description: Driven by passion and guided by experience, I thrive at the intersection of code and creativity.
about.background: With a strong foundation in computer science and hands-on experience in fullstack development, I enjoy building performant and scalable web applications.
about.journey: After completing my academic training in software engineering, I joined Mythec as an apprentice. There, I contributed to several key digital projects, applying modern technologies and best development practices. I constantly seek to improve, learn, and share my knowledge with the developer community.

profile.name: Mamadou Lamine DIASSY
profile.description: Iâ€™m a fullstack developer and apprentice at Mythec, specializing in Microsoft 365 solutions (SharePoint, Power Platform). Passionate about design and photography, I also work as a freelancer, helping small businesses and individuals create modern websites, impactful brand identities, and visual communication materials. My goal is to combine technology and creativity to deliver custom digital experiences
